name: Water Defender
description:
CONTROLS;

 Basic WASD or Arrow Keys

Left mouse button to shoot - mouse to aim

OBJECTIVE:

Extingiush all the fires with your water bullets while making sure you don't touch the fire yourself.

IMPORTANT:

USE 1920x1080 resolution and nothing higher!!!!!!

This is the first game jam game that I have submitted and this was make in 4 days by a absolute noob who is very new to Unity/GameDev. SO there might be many bugs/glitches.
